Package no.ntnu.idatg2001.paths.model.units

Class Player

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatg2001.paths.model.units.Unit
no.ntnu.idatg2001.paths.model.units.Player
@Entity public class Player extends Unit
A class that represents a player with different actions that can be used in a story.
Version:
2023.02.03
Author:
Erik Bjørnsen and Emil Klevgård-Slåttsveen
